test-module.comment: Local directory module; source begins with absolute or relative paths ('/' or './' or '../').

terraform-aws-vpc.comment: Terraform Registry Module; if version is not specified, fetches the latest version.

terraform-aws-vpc2.comment: Git module over HTTPS; if version is not specified, fecthes the default branch. Version can also be a tag or commit SHA.

terraform-aws-vpc3.comment: Git module over HTTPS using alternative '?ref=' syntax to specify version.

terraform-aws-vpc4.comment: Git module over SSH; note ssh-agent needed with appropriate key.

terraform-aws-vpc5.comment: Specify path to module, e.g. within a Git repo/monorepo containing multiple modules.

terraform-aws-vpc6.comment: Specify path to module using alternate path syntax.
